views.markdown:
Supports iOS 10. For iOS 7-9, check out the.

GuestMode gives you the ability to share your device freely and still protect your privacy. Let the kids play games on your device without worrying about them looking at your messages/calling people. Let your friends control your music, but not snoop through your photos or Safari tabs. You choose exactly which apps are accessible and which ones arenâ€™t.

Multiple ways of enabling GuestMode including:
*Guest button on lock screen keypad
*Guest Passcode
*Any Incorrect Passcode
*Time as Guest Passcode (optional offset)
*Activator gesture
* OS X Style Login

Provides a fully customizable guest experience that keeps you in charge. Compatible with all devices on iOS 10. Check out the screenshots for an example of some of the features.

Configure options from Settings.

* Added an option to enter guest mode after x number of failed passcode attempts
* Minor bug fixes
